sentence.Network_en: Ladies and Gentlemen, give it up for Fred Durst.
sentence.Network_cn: 女士们，先生们，请为弗雷德·德斯特来点掌声。

sentence.Network_en: She displayed her wound to the twelve gentlemen of the jury.
sentence.Network_cn: 她给陪审团的12位男士看了她的伤口。

sentence.Network_en: They were performing a short extract from Shakespeare'sTwo Gentlemen of Verona.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们正表演莎士比亚剧作《维洛那二绅士》中的一个片段。

with a little illumination , gentlemen ?, 把灯点亮如何 , 先生们?

and of course , the two gentlemen on my right当然，在我右边的两位先生

list.abs: 产品描述之必备英文术语 ... 书面协定 written agreement 君子协定 gentlemen's agreement 销售合同 sales contract.
费雯·丽_百度百科 ... 乡村绅士/ The Village Squire 绅士的协议（gentlemen's agreement）/ Gentlemen's Agreement 仰头大笑/ Look up and Laugh.
and of course , the two gentlemen on my right ., 当然 , 在我右边的两位先生.
这批“英国绅士”（English gentlemen）洗劫一空之后，海关公署四门大开，街头中外游民才潜入行窃。
...绅士俱乐部（又称绅士会所；英文：gentlemen's club），顾名思义，原为英格兰上流社会男会员而设[http://www.people.com.cn/BIG5/guoji/25/95/20020327/696018.html  保守的古怪规矩英国俱乐部不欢迎女人]，是采用会员制的私人俱乐部].

entry.def: A gentleman is a man who comes from a family of high social standing.

example.ex: ...this wonderful portrait of English gentleman Joseph Greenway.
example.tran: 英国绅士约瑟夫·格林韦的精美画像

entry.tran: 有教养的人；彬彬有礼的人；君子
entry.def: If you say that a man is a gentleman, you mean he is polite and educated, and can be trusted.

example.ex: He was always such a gentleman.

entry.def: You can address men as gentlemen, or refer politely to them as gentlemen.

example.ex: This way, please, ladies and gentlemen...
It seems this gentleman was waiting for the doctor.
example.tran: 这位先生好像在等医生。

entry.def: A gentleman's agreement or a gentlemen's agreement is an informal agreement in which people trust one another to do what they have promised. The agreement is not written down and does not have any legal force.

example.ex: We had no contract; it was done by a gentleman's agreement...
example.tran: 我们没有签合同，就订了个君子协定。

example.ex: She made a gentleman's agreement with her buyer.
example.tran: 她和买主立了个君子协定。

auth_sentence.content: If so, bravo gentlemen it worked a treat.

auth_sentence.content: Sorry, gentlemen: You're not going anywhere.

Sentence.sentence: She isn't going to be shouted down by over-confident young gentlemen.
